games.spiders

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.spiders.GameObject
        • games.spiders.Player

  • public class Player
extends GameObject
    A player in this game. Every AI controls one player.

    • Field Summary

      All the Spiders owned by this player.

      The amount of time (in ns) remaining for this AI to send commands.

    • Field Detail

      • broodMother

        public BroodMother broodMother
        This player's BroodMother. If it dies they lose the game.

      • clientType

        public java.lang.String clientType
        What type of client this is, e.g. 'Python', 'JavaScript', or some other language. For potential data mining purposes.

      • lost

        public boolean lost
        If the player lost the game or not.

      • maxSpiderlings

        public int maxSpiderlings
        The max number of Spiderlings players can spawn.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        The name of the player.

      • otherPlayer

        public Player otherPlayer
        This player's opponent in the game.

      • reasonLost

        public java.lang.String reasonLost
        The reason why the player lost the game.

      • reasonWon

        public java.lang.String reasonWon
        The reason why the player won the game.

      • spiders

        public java.util.List<Spider> spiders
        All the Spiders owned by this player.

      • timeRemaining

        public double timeRemaining
        The amount of time (in ns) remaining for this AI to send commands.

      • won

        public boolean won
        If the player won the game or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Creates a new instance of a Player. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.
